projects.Title: Coffee Table
projects.Description_short: Hand made live edge river table
projects.Description: This table was a fun project made from catalpa wood with blue slate glass cut to fit to the shape of the live edge. The legs are welded together and bolted to the underside of the slab.

projects.Title: Datsun
projects.Description: This is a truck campershell I made for camping and road trips. It is made from repurposed redwood fencing and the sides are vacuum formed layers of mahogany plywood. The surface is laminated with fiberglass and the pop top has canvas siding and hydraulic shocks for lifting it up.

projects.Title: Surfboard Shaping
projects.Description: I make surfboards ranging from fish, asymmetrical boards, funboards, shortboards, longboards, and stand up paddleboards. I also make hand foiled single fins for chinook boxes and fins for fcs boxes.

projects.Title: Hand Planes
projects.Description_short: Fun simple hand planes for body surfing
projects.Description: I make hand planes from scrap pieces. The hand planes can have recycled bike tubes for hand straps or hole cutouts.

about_me: I enjoy using my hands and mind to imagine and create. I am a student halfway through obtaining a degree in mechanical engineering. When I am not busy with school I am working on a variety of projects. Each project is related to some or all of the following goals of; pleasing the eye, inducing an unbelievable thrill, providing a place to rest my feet, or producing energy.
contact_me: If you are interested by the things you see please let me know. I am happy to hear from you and always open to working on custom projects or selling existing projects
